I'm as much lost as you are with g:bf :/ It only gives me meshed screen when i 
start it. I'm just guessing but it might be operating system maybe it should be 
windows 2000 or something? I don't know but I have had same problem with other 
game and I got that fixed using dos emulator, sadly it doesn't work for 
Gladiator :( 


g:bf has been abandoned long time ago and im not sure if some1 still working on 
Gladiator but I hope so because somebody said on the forum he has done a lot on 
it already..
